Not all events are created equal
Over the next several releases, the Events team will be upgrading key pages within our application to bring you a fresh, intuitive user interface; allow you to connect seamlessly with your clients and collaborate with colleagues; and provide you with tools and intelligence that increase and demonstrate your value. Our October release will see the launch of our new calendar interface.
